identity.core_philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Function over Decoration. The UI is the cockpit.

usage.headings: Used for ship names, sector titles, and major alerts. Uppercase preferred with wide tracking (tracking-widest).
usage.body: Used for chat, descriptions, and lore.
usage.mono: Used for changing numbers (coordinates, health, ammo), server logs, and killfeeds.

lobby.structure: Centralized 'Hangar Terminal' card. Heavy vertical symmetry. Background is immersive space nebula.
lobby.alignment: Center-aligned content within the card. Screen edges used for version info and server status.

hud.structure: Perimeter Control. No UI in the center 50% of the screen (the 'Combat Zone').

zones.bottom_left: Ship Status (Hull, Shield, Energy Bars - Thick, readable blocks)

buttons.primary: bg-primary/10 hover:bg-primary/20 text-primary border border-primary/50 hover:border-primary uppercase tracking-widest transition-all duration-200 clip-path-polygon-[0_0,100%_0,100%_70%,90%_100%,0_100%]
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 hover:bg-white/10 text-white border border-white/20 hover:border-white/40

inputs.tactical: bg-black/50 border border-white/20 focus:border-primary/80 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 font-mono

babylon_guidelines.lighting: Point lights for stars/explosions. Hemispheric light for base ambient (very low intensity).
babylon_guidelines.post_processing: REQUIRED: DefaultRenderingPipeline with glowLayerEnabled: true. Bloom is essential for the 'neon space' look.
babylon_guidelines.camera: ArcRotateCamera locked to high alpha/beta for top-down view, but allow slight tilt for depth.
babylon_guidelines.materials: StandardMaterial with emissiveColor for ships (to glow in dark space). SpecularPower high for metallic look.
babylon_guidelines.particles: ParticleSystem for engine trails (cyan/orange). Solid particles for asteroid fields.

lobby_nebula.alt: Deep purple and blue galaxy nebula illustration

deep_space_alt.alt: Abstract dark background with scattered particles

universal_guidelines.animations: Micro-interactions on hover. Smooth transitions for HUD bars. No 'bounce' effects - keep it mechanical/linear.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure high contrast for text (White on Black). Status bars must have distinct colors (Red/Blue/Yellow) not just shades.
universal_guidelines.testing: All interactive elements MUST have data-testid attributes (e.g., 'join-game-btn', 'hull-bar').

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup Shadcn with the provided dark theme colors.
2. Install 'lucide-react' for icons (Radar, Crosshair, Shield, Zap).
3. Create a 'GameCanvas' component that wraps the Babylon.js engine.
4. Create a 'HUD' component that overlays absolute on top of GameCanvas.
5. Use the 'lobby_nebula' image as the background for the Landing Page.
6. Ensure the canvas resizes correctly and captures mouse events for ship movement.
7. Implement the 'Warp Jump' visual as a camera FOV distortion + particle burst.
